Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rectangle
      • CollidableRectangle
        • Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class Car
extends CollidableRectangle
    Represents a car, which is a CollidableRectangle with effect 1 (bounce)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bustedSpeed
      The speed at which the car was busted (default : 0)
      int bustedTime
      The number of 50ms rounds during which the car is busted by the police (default : 0)
      boolean Racer
      The Car type (true = racer, false = civilian)
      int xAcc
      The Car acceleration on the x-axis ([-4,4])
      double xSpeed
      The Car speed on the x-axis (positive means on the right, negative on the left) ([-8,8])
      int yAcc
      The Car acceleration on the y-axis ([-8,4])
      double ySpeed
      The Car speed on the y-axis ([0.5,2] for civilans, [0.5,3.58] for racers, [0.5,4.64] for player.

      • Fields inherited from class CollidableRectangle

        effect

      • Fields inherited from class Rectangle

        height, id, width, x, y

    • Field Detail

      • xSpeed

        public double xSpeed
        The Car speed on the x-axis (positive means on the right, negative on the left) ([-8,8])

      • ySpeed

        public double ySpeed
        The Car speed on the y-axis ([0.5,2] for civilans, [0.5,3.58] for racers, [0.5,4.64] for player. Can be 0 if blocked or greater than the max if pushed. Multiply by 50 to obtain the speed in Km/h.

      • xAcc

        public int xAcc
        The Car acceleration on the x-axis ([-4,4])

      • yAcc

        public int yAcc
        The Car acceleration on the y-axis ([-8,4])

      • Racer

        public boolean Racer
        The Car type (true = racer, false = civilian)

      • bustedTime

        public int bustedTime
        The number of 50ms rounds during which the car is busted by the police (default : 0)

      • bustedSpeed

        public int bustedSpeed
        The speed at which the car was busted (default : 0)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car(double x,
           double y,
           int width,
           int height,
           int id,
           int effect,
           double xSpeed,
           double ySpeed,
           int xAcc,
           int yAcc,
           boolean Racer)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - The position of the Rectangle on the x-axis
        y - The position of the Rectangle on the y-axis
        width - Rectangle width
        height - Rectangle height
        id - Rectangle id
        effect - The effect in case of collision
        xSpeed - The speed of the car on the x-axis
        ySpeed - The speed of the car on the y-axis
        xAcc - The acceleration of the car on the x-axis
        yAcc - The acceleration of the car on the y-axis
        Racer - The car type
